definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItem" id="CurrentItemInHand">CurrentItemInHand</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:CurrentItemInHand</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="itemstack_has_enchantment"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:Miner</field><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:CurrentItemInHand</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_random_number_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">12</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">24</field></block></value></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.COBBLESTONE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
